name: com.johannesmp.unityscenereference
description: A SceneReference wrapper class that uses ISerializationCallbackReceiver and a custom PropertyDrawer to provide safe, user-friendly scene references in scripts.
description_zhCN: 使用ISerializationCallbackReceiver和一个自定义PropertyDrawer在脚本中提供安全而友好的场景引用的SceneReference包装类。
